text: Brandon Farmelo (born March 1, 2002) is an American soccer player who plays as a midfielder for Colorado Springs Switchbacks in the USL Championship on loan from the Colorado Rapids academy http://rapd.ussoccerda.com/sam/teams/index.php?team=1399826&player;=30957183https://www.uslchampionship.com/brandon- farmelo ==References== ==External links== *Profile at US Development Academy Category:2002 births Category:Living people Category:Colorado Springs Switchbacks FC players Category:American soccer players Category:Association football midfielders Category:Soccer players from Colorado Category:USL Championship players
title: Brandon Farmelo
